mapper.select: SELECT block.`blockID`,block.`blockName`,post.`postID`,post.`postTitle`,postReplyID,postReplyContent,user.`userID`,user.`userName`,postReplyTime FROM postreply JOIN post ON postreply.`postID` = post.`postID` JOIN block ON block.`blockID` = post.`blockID` JOIN USER ON postreply.`userID` = user.`userID` WHERE postReplyContent LIKE '%${searchField}%'
